overview.challenge: OneOver brings together the world's top design, strategy, and innovation talent on-demand. The platform needed to feel premium, trustworthy, and showcase world-class creative work while being easy to navigate.
overview.solution: Built a comprehensive portfolio and service platform that showcases creative excellence while maintaining an intuitive user experience. Designed systems that emphasize quality, trust, and accessibility to creative services.
overview.impact: Established OneOver as the go-to platform for on-demand creative talent, with a growing network of world-class creatives and satisfied clients.

slides.title: OneOver.com
slides.description: AI is powerful, but it is fragmented. OneOver is a single unified workspace where creators can access the world's leading models in one place. Compare outputs, switch models instantly, and create without friction on any device. A multi model and multi modal platform built for clarity and exploration.
